data.2: Returned to Carrier's Terminal - Delivery attempted by the carrier; shipment was returned to the carrier's terminal
data.3: Returned to Shipper - Shipment was returned to the shipper per the instructions of the consignee
data.A: Arrived - Shipment has arrived at the location specified
data.AA: Pick-up Appointment Date and Time - The date and time of the scheduled pick-up appointment
data.AD: Delivery Appointment Date and Time - The date and time of the scheduled delivery appointment
data.AF: Departed Pickup Location - Shipment has been picked up
data.AG: Estimated Delivery - Estimated date of delivery to the consignee or receiver
data.AH: Attempted Delivery - Delivery of the shipment was attempted by the carrier
data.AI: Shipment Has Been Reconsigned - Shipment has been reconsigned per the shipper or consignee
data.AJ: Tendered for Delivery - Shipment has been offered for delivery to the consignee
data.AN: Delivered to Air Carrier - Shipment was delivered to air freight carrier
data.AR: Rail Arrival at Destination Intermodal Ramp
data.AV: Available for Delivery - Shipment available for delivery
data.B: Bad Order (Inoperative or Damaged) - Shipment was on a piece of equipment that failed
data.BD: Recommitted Delivery Date - Delivery date and time of shipment has been revised necessitated by changes in pickup, transit, or delivery conditions not originally assumed by the carrier
data.BE: Estimated Time of Arrival at Scheduled Pick-up Location - The carrier's estimate of when the shipment will be picked up at the consignor's location
data.CO: Cargo Received at Contractual Place of Receipt
data.D: Completed Unloading at Delivery Location - Shipment was delivered to the consignee or receiver
data.E: Estimated to Arrive (En Route) - Shipment is estimated to arrive at the location specified
data.ED: Early Delivery Appointment Date and/or Time
data.EE: Empty Equipment Dispatched - Empty equipment dispatched to pick up cargo
data.EI: Interchange Information Received - Interchange of intermodal equipment to another carrier
data.EP: Early Pickup Appointment Date and/or Time
data.G: Repaired and/or Released from Bad Order
data.H: Equipment Shopped for Heavy Repair - Shipment is delayed due to equipment failure
data.HR: Hold Released - Equivalent to Automated Manifest System (AMS) disposition codes 1F, 74, 76, 80, 81 and 82
data.IB: U.S. Customs, In-bond Movement Authorized - Equivalent to Automated Manifest System (AMS) disposition codes 1D, 1J
data.IR: Movement Type Changed from In-bond to Not In-bond
data.J: Delivered to Connecting Line - Shipment has been delivered to an interline carrier
data.K: Arrived at Customs - Customs delay; shipment is being processed at the customs location
data.L: Loading - Shipment is being loaded at a carrier's terminal or facility
data.LD: Late Delivery Appointment Date and/or Time
data.LP: Late Pickup Appointment Date and/or Time
data.N: No Paperwork Received with Shipment or Equipment
data.NC: Confirmation of Notification - Advisement of notified party at destination has acknowledged receipt of notification
data.NU: Notification Refused - Notify party at destination has refused notification
data.O: Paperwork Received- Did Not Receive Shipment or Equipment
data.P: Departed Terminal Location - Shipment has left the carrier's terminal or other control point
data.PC: US Custom Hold, Discrepancy in Paperwork
data.PD: US Custom Hold, Discrepancy in Piece Count
data.PE: US Custom Hold, Hold by Coast Guard
data.PF: US Custom Hold, Hold by F.B.I.
data.PG: US Custom Hold, Hold by Local Law Enforcement
data.PH: US Custom Hold, Hold by Court Imposed Lien
data.PI: US Custom Hold, Hold by Food and Drug
data.PJ: US Custom Hold, Hold by Fish and Wildlife
data.PK: US Custom Hold, Hold by Drug Enforcement
data.PL: US Dept. Agr, Hold for Intensive Investigation
data.PM: US Dept. Agr, Hold for Unregistered Producer
data.PN: US Dept. Agr, Hold for Restricted Commodity
data.PO: US Dept. Agr, Hold for Insect Infestation
data.PP: US Dept. Agr, Hold for Bacterial Contamination
data.PQ: U.S. Customs Hold at Place of Vessel Arrival - U.S. Customs has placed a hold on cargo at the place of arrival
data.PR: U.S. Customs Hold at In-Bond Destination - U.S. Customs has placed a hold on cargo at the in-bond destination
data.PS: U.S. Department of Agriculture Hold at Place of Vessel Arrival - U.S. Department of Agriculture has placed a hold on cargo at the place of arrival
data.PT: U.S. Department of Agriculture Hold at In-Bond Destination - U.S. Department of Agriculture has placed a hold on cargo at the in-bond destination
data.PU: Other U.S. Agency Hold at Place of Vessel Arrival - A government agency other than U.S. Customs or the U.S. Department of Agriculture has placed a hold on cargo at the place of arrival
data.PV: Other U.S. Agency Hold at In-Bond Destination - A government agency other than U.S. Customs or the U.S. Department of Agriculture has placed a hold on cargo at the in-bond destination
data.PW: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Hold for Fumigation - Equivalent to Automated Manifest System (AMS) disposition codes 73, 79
data.PX: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Hold for Inspection or Documentation Review - Equivalent to Automated Manifest System (AMS) disposition codes 72, 78
data.R: Received from Prior Carrier - Shipment has been received from an interline carrier
data.RA: Pickup Appointment Requested - Appointment for pickup has been requested
data.RI: Movement Type Changed from Not In-bond to In-bond
data.RL: Rail Departure from Origin Intermodal Ramp
data.RN: Renotification - Notify party at destination has been renotified
data.S: Spotted at Consignee's Location - Shipment in a trailer has been spotted at the consignee or receiver's premises
data.SI: Receipt of Shipping Instructions - Shipping instructions received
data.VA: Vessel Arrival - Vessel scheduled to arrive or has arrived
data.VD: Vessel Departure - Vessel scheduled to depart or has departed
data.X: Removed from Customer Dock or Siding
data.X1: Arrived at Delivery Location - The carrier has arrived at the shipment delivery location
data.X2: Estimated Time of Arrival at Consignee Location
data.X5: Arrived at Delivery Location Loading Dock
data.X8: Arrived at Pick-up Location Loading Dock - The carrier has arrived at the loading dock at the pick-up location
data.X9: Delivery Appointment Secured - The date and time that the delivery appointment was made
data.XA: Pick-up Appointment Secured - The date and time that the pick-up appointment was made
data.XB: Shipment Acknowledged - Shipment has been accepted by the carrier, but awaiting pick-up and/or delivery appointment(s) before dispatching equipment for pick-up
